text: cēādikkuka: niṅṅaḷ cinticcunēākkiyiṭṭuṇṭēā? allāhu niṅṅaḷuṭe kēḷviyuṁ kāḻcayuṁ naṣṭappeṭuttukayuṁ niṅṅaḷuṭe hr̥dayaṅṅaḷkk mudravekkukayuṁ ceytāl allāhu allāte ētu daivamāṇ niṅṅaḷkkava vīṇṭeṭutt tarika? nēākkū, nāṁ eṅṅaneyeākkeyāṇavarkk teḷivukaḷ vivariccukeāṭukkunnatenn. enniṭṭuṁ avar pintiriññupēāvukayāṇ
